column4: auro1: You can burn CDs and you can (if needed) download files, so yes, I don't see why it couldn't.
I didn't know you could make windows images off UNetBootin
correct=p but auro1 doesn't have blank cds
So I don't think he can use unetbootin to make an USB bootable for a Windows7 image - I think it won't work

auro1: Well that isn't cool. Alright, auro1, ask in the ##windows channel how to make Windows on a flash drive (*if* you can then ask in here for mroe details if needed) (assuming you have another flash drive)
